title: A Nomad boy
creator_credit: UNICEF, Canadian Broadcasting Corporation and Denis Hargrave
brief_description: Portrays Somalia, an African country near the Red Sea, with emphasis on its nomadic camel herders. Features Ismael, a 12-year-old boy, who spends his life searching for pastures for his flocks. Suitable for upper primary and lower seconday levels.
